fact.description: The match has started at Estadio das Dunas.

Throw-in Cameroon.

Cameroon have a goal kick.

Cameroon to take a throw-in in Mexico territory.

In Natal Mexico's Oribe Peralta is caught offside.
Ball safe as Mexico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mexico's Hector Herrera breaks free at Estadio das Dunas. But the strike goes wide of the post.

Wilmar Roldan signals a Mexico throw-in in Cameroon's half.
Mexico have a dangerous throw-in.

Cameroon have been awarded a corner by Wilmar Roldan.
Stephane M'Bia (Cameroon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.

Cameroon needs to be cautious. Mexico have an attacking throw-in.

Cameroon are pushing forward but Samuel Eto'o's finish is wide of the goal.

Volker Finke is making the team's first substitution at Estadio das Dunas with Dany Nounkeu replacing Cedric Djeugoue.

Wilmar Roldan signals a Mexico throw-in in Cameroon's half.

In Natal Mexico drive forward through Giovani Dos Santos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Giovani Dos Santos is back on the pitch.
Giovani Dos Santos is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.

Mexico awarded a free kick in their own half.

Hector Herrera for Mexico is back on the field again.
Wilmar Roldan has blown to resume play in Natal.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hector Herrera for Mexico who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
At Estadio das Dunas the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the second half.
Benjamin Moukandjo (Cameroon) strikes at Estadio das Dunas but his header is cleared.
Hector Herrera (Mexico) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Carlos Salcido.
Wilmar Roldan awards Cameroon a goal kick.
Mexico's Javier Hernandez misses with an attempt on goal.
Throw-in for Mexico in their own half.
Can Mexico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cameroon's half?
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
